body.name: Tripod for iPhone, 71" Tall Phone Tripod with Remote Phone Holder, Selfie Stick Cellphone Tripod, Phone Stand Tripod for Travel Selfies Video Recording Vlog, Compatible with iPhone/Android/Gopro
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Tall Tripod with cold shoe】 In order to meet the needs of every creators, we raised the tall phone tripod height to 71inch. And phone holder for tripod with cold shoe designed, it can be mounted with fill-in light and microphone equipment, supports horizontal and vertical screen rotation, adjust the photo angle freely to meet your daily shooting needs

【Wireless Remote Tripod 】Cell phone tripod stand with wireless remote control, Compatible with IOS/Android system, you can take selfies up to 10 meters ( 33feet )away with a simple connection. Universal mobile phone clip can securely holds all smartphones from 2.2"-3.6" in size wide, compatible with iPhone 15 14 13 12 11 Pro/MAX/8, Samsung Galaxy S21 and more

【Flexible Cellphone Tripod 】 Filming tripod for iphone combines 180° swivel neck and 360° swivel head functions, allowing multi-angle adjustments and capture more special angles for photography. Perfect for group photos, vlogging, video recording, podcasts, Facebook Live, Facetime, Instagram, live streaming

【Selfie Stick Tripod for Phone Camera】The detachable tripod for cell phone can be effortlessly converted into a long selfie stick, which can help you take the most satisfying selfies. With 1/4" standard screws, it is compatible with mobile phones, gopro (gopro adapter included), DSLR, webcams and projectors.

【Lightweight & Strong Tripod】 Portable travel tripod is made of high quality reinforced aluminum alloy for durability and stabilized, yet lightweight at only 1.37lbs. With a compact size of 21inch, it makes the tripod more travel-friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son sings and plays guitar and this stand was perfect to hold his recorder while he plays. It adjusts to any position. He's thinking about getting another one to hold his phone and record on there too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to get family photos with everyone in them while my daughter was in the states. I was actually surprised this worked so well. Some of the review said it didn't hold the phone well. It worked perfect. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for beginner YouTuber
reviews.reviewText: It's not the most sturdy if you want to use it for a 90-degree angle, but it works. You'll need to add some counter weight so it doesn't tip over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Need to take pictures straight down to ground and the gooseneck provides the flexibility needed. In addition, the product is sturdy, well engineered and the remote paired easily with my Pixel phone. Hard to improve on this tool especially considering the low cost,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All content creators should have this!
reviews.reviewText: If you like to record yourself cooking, opening packages or simply making videos I recommend this 100%! The best phone hold stand! For the price can’t complain! A must for content creators. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed this stand so badly. It is everything !!! I am a chronic Netflix and chill in bed kind of girl. The grip on the phone is the width so it makes it possible for me to lay in bed with headphones plugged into the phone and watch whatever. Charging the phone while in the stand is possible too! Huge for me! The stand is sturdy allowing me to scroll through my phone at night without having to hold it in my hand. The clamp is tight, no phone falling on my face! The base is a tripod like design so it’s not tipping over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to adjust, but I'd you are looking for something with height, which this has, just know it falls over easily when you are using it to it to film when extended past a certain point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he used it to set up his phone to record the kids opening presents. It's easy to use and convenient
